name: Tower Defense (harvey.zh)
description:
Assignment 3 Skill Depth

How to play:

- Click on the grass to spawn a tower.

- Click on the ground to spawn an enemy.

- Try to get a high score with limited time and resources.

There are two types of towers and two types of enemies, corresponding to the left and right mouse buttons. The formula used to calculate the score is included so use that to your advantage.
